template.subject: A new rule has been created
template.encryptedBody: A new rule has been created with priority ${outcome.rulePriority}. You can check its details in Fees, Commissions and Limits (FCL) menu.

template.subject: An existing rule has been edited
template.encryptedBody: Rule with priority ${outcome.rulePriority} has been edited. You can check its details in Fees, Commissions and Limits (FCL) menu.

template.subject: A rule has been deleted
template.encryptedBody: Rule with priority ${outcome.rulePriority} has been deleted.
